func.title: SetLeaguePerformance

param.name: player_id
param.desc: ID of player whose score shall be set. If not given, global performance for all players is set.

func.desc: Sets the league score. This function can be used for custom scenario scoring in competition or adventure leagues.
func.remark: Use GetPlayerID() to get the ID of a joined player.

example.text: Rock script modification: Whenever a rock is collected by a Clonk, the score of all players is increased.
